name: Koushirou
text:
If 1 of your cost 5 or lower <Slash> attribute Characters other than this Character would be K.O.'d by an opponent's effect, you may rest this Character instead.
[Blocker]

effect.text: If 1 of your cost 5 or lower <Slash> attribute Characters other than this Character would be K.O'd by an opponent's effect, you may rest this Character instead.
